alert.note: Alert for Hamilton (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 28 at 5:19PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT NORTHWESTERN HAMILTON AND SOUTHWESTERN ECHOLS COUNTIES THROUGH 600 PM EDT... At 519 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm capable of producing a landspout over Jennings, moving northwest at 10 mph. HAZARD...Landspouts and wind gusts around 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Jennings. LANDSPOUT...POSSIBLE MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
